DataElement.preferredName: Investigator Study Site Research Personnel Role Identifier ISO21090.II.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique symbol that establishes identity of the study site investigator.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Investigator Study Site Research Personnel Role Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:People engaged in research.:The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Investigator Study Site Research Personnel Role
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:People engaged in research.:The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.

Concepts.definition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.
The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.
